item.description:
Why should people come?
because I think breakfast is the best food in the world!!! :)

Sunset is very conveniently located right on the B line (Harvard Ave) and pretty easy to drive to, too.
http://www.allstonsfi...

I actually never have been there for the brunch, but I know they have pretty good food and drinks.
item.how_to_find_us: look for Sun (I'll also email you my number a day before)
item.name: Brunch at Sunset Grill and Tap
